import React, { useRef } from "react"; import {auth} from './Firebase' function Login() { const emailRef = useRef(null); const passwordRef = useRef(null); const SignIn = e => { e.preventDefault(); auth.signInUserWithEmailAndPassword( emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value ).then(user=> { console.log(user) }).catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } return (
